2014-04-15-planet-abes.title: Planet of the Abes
2014-04-15-planet-abes.author: admin
2014-04-15-planet-abes.__content: This T-shirt design illustration is based on a poster for the original movie Planet of the Apes (see the thumbnail on the right) I was limited to only 6 colours, so I decided to create it in Illustrator. Using a Wacom tablet, I recreated the major shading and swapped out the apes with *Abes*. Having the image cropped as a rectangle (like the poster) was a bit boring, so I cropped it as a top hat, to add to the general look and feel of Abraham Lincoln. Hope you like it!
